name: Light The Way (itch) (disfunkty)
description:
Update: Fixed restart level button in the pause menu. Uploaded Mac version!

Ted Small and Antonio Lepore set out to make a game in one week, this is the result. The project was started on January 6th 2020 and completed January 12Th, enjoy!

Theme: Light and Darkness

Concept: You must use your torch to light the fires and escape rooms shrouded in darkness.

Product Info: Unity, top down 2D adventure puzzler.

Summary: Progress by moving blocks and lighting torches. Shadows will obscure and hinder your path.

Outline: Light three torches and illuminate your surroundings while moving obstacles and avoiding shadow enemies that slow you down before they drain your battery.
